summary: Completed comprehensive testing of deepfake detection website iteration 5 with new features: URL-based analysis, public sharing links, image annotations with numbered markers, and re-analysis capability. All new features working correctly with 100% backend API success and excellent frontend integration.
passed_tests: ✅ Backend: All 18 API tests passed (100% success rate)
✅ POST /api/analysis/url - URL analysis working with https://thispersondoesnotexist.com/
✅ Analysis results include annotations array with proper structure (region, label, description, severity)
✅ Analysis results include preview field for images (base64 format)
✅ Frontend: Upload/URL mode toggle working on analyze page
✅ URL input mode with paste box and analyze button functional
✅ URL analysis completed successfully (15-20 seconds as expected)
✅ AnnotatedImage component showing 6 numbered markers with tooltips
✅ Analysis detail page share button creates and displays share link
✅ SharedAnalysisPage loads without authentication for public access
✅ All existing features still work (auth, dashboard, history, compare, settings)
✅ Arabic language support confirmed on shared analysis page
✅ PDF report generation working for both English and Arabic analyses
✅ Dual-pass forensic analysis pipeline (15-20 seconds) working correctly
✅ All UI elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing

success_percentage.frontend: 95% - All key features working, minor session timeout during extended testing
